overview: Meet the Pleasure Seekers! They're looking for lust in all the hot places - and find it they do! Tom Byron needs some help getting his girlfriends primed. But once he gets going, the party doesn't end! Sizzling Rachel Ryan and Tamara Lee stretch the boundaries of fiery erotic abandon to juicy new heights of sleazy sexuality! Lusty lezzing, one-night-stands, and frantic fantasy encounters make sure that this band of erotic explorers hit the hot spot every time!
title: Pleasure Seekers
